name: GDevelop Save/Load Yarn Dialogue
description:
This is a simple way to save/load (the dialogue tree) dialogue states of yarn  in GDevelop! Feel free to download the example and review the code.

It includes:

  • Dialogue System
  • Expandable Save/Load

You don't need to credit me for any of this, just share it to those that need it. Plenty of people have the same code so I thought to write all down here for anyone to take.

Eventually, I will release a video discussing this project file in brevity to help understand what I did and why I did certain things.
